Pardus

Pardus is a Debian based stable operating system.
It combines stability, modern and end-user needs.

There are two main versions of Pardus; Pardus Gnome and Pardus Xfce. Pardus comes pre-installed with basic packages and Pardus applications. Also you can install many applications with Pardus Software Center.

Get Started
Applications Developed by Pardus Core Team
My Computer Displays disk information and provides access to folders, files, and devices.
Image Writer A simple disk image USB burner based on Gtk+ and Python.
Power Manager Power management tool for Pardus.
Package Installer A simple tool for viewing and installing local deb files.
Java Installer Easily install and manage Java versions.
Software Center Install, remove, and update applications from our store.
